title: "KBRA Assigns Preliminary Ratings to Pagaya AI Debt Selection Trust 2021-1"
excerpt: "Kroll Bond Rating Agency (KBRA) assigns preliminary ratings to three classes of notes issued by Pagaya AI Debt Selection Trust 2021-1 (“PAID 2021-1”), a consumer loan ABS transaction. This transaction is the second publicly rated securitization for Pagaya Investments US LLC (“Pagaya”)."
